casebody.data:
CITY OF ROSEVILLE, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
John MUSTA, Jr., Defendant-Appellant,
and
Kim C. Loffredo and First Federal of Michigan, a/k/a Charter One Bank, FSB, Defendants. SC: 158977
COA: 338535 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 2, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for expedited consideration is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the October 16, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
